company.name: Southaven Internal Medicine
company.description: Southaven Internal Medicine has been committed to providing our patients with the highest level of care in a friendly and comfortable environment. Our goal is to make our patients feel like they are family. As a practice, we focus on preventative medicine, health screenings, and helping our community find solutions to the health challenges they face. Our board certified physicians will work with you to achieve the best possible state of health and well being.
company.hours: Monday & Wednesday: 7:00 am-5:00 pm, Tuesday & Thursday 8:00 am-5:00 pm, Friday 7:00 am-11:00 am
